title: Article Search Interface
description: This is actually first professional React project that I ever worked on, and I'm super excited that its still in use almost unchanged two years later! I built a small React app to handle the search functionality for scientific articles. Features included a search bar, various search filters, result cards, and pagination. In addition to building the application, we used a component based approached that adhered to thier existing design system structure.

deliverables: Frontend search functionality for scientific articles including filters, sorting, and pagination
Component based approach with documentation in Pattern Lab
